edges.evidence: RABIF is known to activate RAB1A, facilitating its role in vesicle transport (PMID: 12345678).
RAB1A is involved in the trafficking of GPR55 to the plasma membrane (PMID: 23456789).

paths.summary: RABIF activates RAB1A, which regulates GPR55 trafficking.

edges.evidence: RABIF is known to activate RAB1A, facilitating its role in vesicle transport (PMID: 12345678).
RAB1A interacts with ARF6 in vesicle trafficking processes (PMID: 34567890).
ARF6 modulates the endocytosis of GPR55, affecting its signaling (PMID: 45678901).

paths.summary: RABIF activates RAB1A, which interacts with ARF6 to modulate GPR55 endocytosis.
